name: Unicorn Wings
description: This pattern is for wings only, for adding to another pattern. I designed these wings for the pattern Nilla the Unicorn by Rachel Borello Carroll, but you could use these wings for another pattern that has similar proportions. I recommend using the same yarn/needle weight as the rest of your project. I made my wings using my CC for the Nilla the Unicorn pattern.
suggested_yarn: Any gauge - designed for any gauge ?
full_text: This pattern is for wings only, for adding to another pattern. I designed these wings for the pattern Nilla the Unicorn by Rachel Borello Carroll, but you could use these wings for another pattern that has similar proportions. I recommend using the same yarn/needle weight as the rest of your project. I made my wings using my CC for the Nilla the Unicorn pattern.
